page.title: 02THE STORY OF HARRIOT MYTTON.
page.content: {Harriot Mytton}lived at Shipton Hall about the year 1750. She started writing on the windows when she was twelve. I think she probably did it with a diamond that was in a ring she got for her birthday. On one window she wrote {P call on April 1743 She fell in love with a boy who lived at{Larden Hall}but her mum and dad would not let her marry him. They locked her up in her room Then she wrote on the window a lot. If you go in that room you can see what she wrote. In the end she married the boy. She died when she was over eighty years old and is buried in the graveyard of{Shipton {Church.
